entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
